Project description

coincurve

CI/CD
Docs
Package
Meta

This library provides well-tested Python bindings for libsecp256k1, the heavily optimized C libraryused by Bitcoin Core for operations on the elliptic curve secp256k1.

Feel free to read the documentation!

Users

  • Ethereum
  • LBRY
  • libp2p

and many more!

License

coincurve is distributed under the terms of any of the following licenses:

  • MIT
  • Apache-2.0
